name: Mirrorhead
description:
Simple and short horror game inspired from Sirenhead character.

Made for Week Game Jam 148 to polish my modelling & texturing skills.  The end result of the game is not good enough! Sorry :D

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-148
